</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.96</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns render version of [[PositionWorld]], which is [[PositionASL]] of the model centre [0,0,0] of an object in render scope, rather than transformed [[boundingCenter]] or [[Oxygen_2_-_Manual#LandContact|LandContact]] vertices. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[getPosWorldVisual]] object </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]; 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [[PositionWorld]] in render scope </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>_obj [[setPosWorld]] [[getPosWorldVisual]] _obj;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2 </name>=<value> <code>_groundObj [[modelToWorldVisualWorld]] [0,0,0] [[isEqualTo]] [[getPosWorldVisual]] _groundObj; //true</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3 </name>=<value> Wave height under a boat:<code>_h = ((boat [[modelToWorldVisual]] [0,0,0]) [[vectorDiff]] [[getPosWorldVisual]] boat) [[select]] 2;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[getPosWorld]], [[setPosWorld]], [[visiblePosition]], [[getPosATLVisual]], [[getPosASLVisual]], [[visiblePositionASL]], [[modelToWorldVisual]], [[modelToWorldVisualWorld]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
